definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.chinese: 我要一杯马丁尼鸡尾酒。
詹姆士喜欢上好的马丁尼。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?A Scotch, a screw-driver or a martini?
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰威士忌酒，还是起子酒或马丁尼酒？

sentences.english: Yes, plesae. A martini on the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 好，来一杯加冰块的马丁尼。

sentences.english: How can anyone get so drunk on one and a half martinis?
sentences.chinese: 怎么会有人只喝一杯半马丁尼就醉了？

sentences.english: A very dry martini is almost like straight gin.
sentences.chinese: 非常干的马丁尼酒几乎就像纯杜松子酒一样。

sentences.english: Dry martini , Beefeater. All right, sir.
sentences.chinese: 辛辣马丁尼，比飞特，好的，先生。
请给我来杯超干马丁尼酒。

sentences.english: From that moment Martinez resolved to learn everything she could about the queen.
sentences.chinese: 从那时候起，马丁尼决心去了解这位女王的一切。

sentences.english: B:I'll have a Martini,very dry.Do I pay now or later?
sentences.chinese: 我要干马丁尼，我现在付钱还是等一下？

sentences.english: I would only have a few sips of the W-tini.
sentences.chinese: 而我只能抿几小口布什马丁尼。

sentences.english: Ok, a cup of martini cocktail, please.
sentences.chinese: 好的，一杯马丁尼鸡尾酒。

sentences.english: On Monday, the martini bar serves drinks for only five dollars.
sentences.chinese: 星期一，马丁尼酒吧一杯酒只卖五块钱。

sentences.english: She knows how to make a mean/sick/killer apple martini.
sentences.chinese: 她调的苹果马丁尼真的很好喝。

sentences.english: The olive is spoken of as the ruination of martini .
sentences.chinese: 有人认为橄榄会使马丁尼酒走味。
